client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM first encountered Dupont Peiren Lambrechts on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
Dupont Peiren Lambrechts is a 24 year old and comes from Belgium.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced he to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Dupont Peiren Lambrechts is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Dupont earned his secondary school diploma from Institut Saint-Guibert in 2019.
Dupont graduated from Vesalius College in 2025, completing his higher education.

Dupont Peiren Lambrechts is a 24 year old and comes from Belgium.

client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He did not manage to save any money during his career.
Client does not have any properties.In 2018, he received an inheritance of 2060000 EUR from his late grandfather, who was a prominent Hedge Fund Manager, and has since invested it in various assets.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is committed to helping Dupont achieve financial success and security as he embarks on his professional journey.
